Name: Roadworks - The Simulation
About the game: This simulation transports you to the varied work in road construction. Re-enact typical assignments and scenarios on country roads and motorways. Get to work with the asphalt mill, steamroller, marking machine and many more special vehicles. Build a new section of motorway, widen lanes and renew the road surface. Use tools like the jack hammer and secure the site with barriers. Includes detailed vehicles and a range of camera angles. FEATURES Diverse assignments like building a section of motorway, renewing the road surface and widening lanes Lovingly detailed vehicles and different camera angles Challenging assignments ranging from standard road repairs to building an airport road Choose from lots of special vehicles: marking machine, steamroller, excavator
